content: "Te la sei spassata con la mia ragazza?". "È stata solo una pomiciata veloce sul divano. Era Natale. Eravamo ubriachi. Non ha significato nulla".
translations: eng:Did you get off with my girlfriend﹖ It was just a quick snog on the sofa. It was Christmas. We were drunk. It didn't mea
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Nuel (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
